column5: Location, location, location! Walk or bike to everything in central Austin: Downtown, 6th St, the University of Texas, the Capitol, and so much more! Our music-lovers' retreat is in the heart of the trendy eastside, just 1-2 blocks from great restaurants and bars in a vibrant neighborhood with tons of activity. The inside space is cozy, but has big personality, and a private deck provides outdoor living space. Great for couples, solo adventurers, or business travelers. Parking spot included!
